discourse_list.title: MIP64 (Bug Bounty Program) Discussion + First Office Hours for 2022

content.content: Hello everyone, We’ll be having a presentation with regards to MIP64, the creation of a bug bounty program covering critical infrastructure to be hosted on the Immunefi platform, which is currently open for voting. This will last about 30 minutes and afterwards we’ll have 30 minutes of office hours for anyone who has security-related questions within the Maker ecosystem. This will be at 16:00 UTC on Thursday, the 20th of January, and anyone can join at https://meet.google.com/awy-pkwn-sws.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
